products.name: High Voltage Motors
products.description: CG offers CACA Motors, which include TP and FT Series High Voltage Induction Motors.

products.name: CG offers Squirrel Cage motors in horizontal (IMB3), vertical (IMV1) and inclined (IMB5, IMV5) mounting options to suit every customer requirement.
Air Cooled Induction Motors - IC 6A1A1, IC 6A1A6, IC 6A6A6 (CACA)
products.description: The TP range of motors have  been designed to meet diversified application demands, while maintaining excellent performance and highest quality. The robust design helps function with variable voltage, variable frequency drives.

products.name: Air Cooled Induction Motors - IC 6A1A1, IC 6A1A6, IC 6A6A6 (CACA)
products.description: The FT range of induction motor includes FTC/FTCV type Squirrel Cage and FTA/FTAV type Slip Ring Motors., -  FTC/FTA types are horizontal and foot mounted (IM B3, IEC60034-7) machines, whereas FTCV/FTAV types are vertical, flange mounted (IM V1, IEC 60034-7). These motors are totally enclosed (IP 54, IEC 60034-5), self cooled with air-to-air heat exchanger (IC 6A1A1/IC 6A1A6) as per IEC 60034-6.

products.name: Double Cage Motor for Cement Mill.
products.description: The range of air cooled motors are  also available with an external blower; wherein the cooling is independent of the speed of the motor, which is preferred for variable speed applications.

products.name: Double Cage Motor for Cement Mill.
products.description: Built in accordance with IEC 60034-1 / IS 325 standards, we offer customized, energy efficient and intelligent motors for various applications in IP23, IP55, IP56 and IP65 enclosures. We offer a wide range of cooling systems ranging from Self Circulation type (IC611) to independent forced circulation circuits (IC616), water cooled (IC8A1W7) and Tube Ventilated (IC511) to fin cooled (IC411) types.

products.name: Water Cooled Induction Motors - IC 8A1W7 (CACW)
products.description: The motors offered ranging from Open Air Circuit (IC01) and Closed Air Circuit (IC611) to independent externally fed air circuit (IC616). These are designed for optimum performance in adherence with application and site requirements of performance and space.

products.name: Water Cooled Induction Motors - IC 8A1W7 (CACW)
products.description: These motors have been designed to meet diversified application demands, while maintaining excellent performance and the highest quality. The robust design helps function with variable voltage, variable frequency drives.

products.name: Open Air Type Induction Motor - IC 0A1, IC 0A6 (SPDP)
products.description:
For the raw and cement ball-mill twin drives Slip Ring or other wound type rotor motors are used all over the world.

This new solution is significantly cheaper from the investment view compared to the traditional solutions.

On one hand the double-cage motor is substantially cheaper than the Slip Ring motor, On the other hand the costly starting equipment and the adherent shortcircuiting switch together with the controller are not required. The usage of our solution due to the low operational and maintenance costs further increase the adaptability of this new equipment.

products.name: Open Air Type Induction Motor - IC 0A1, IC 0A6 (SPDP)
products.description: Built in accordance with IEC 60034-1 / IS 325 standards, we offer customized, energy efficient and intelligent motors for various applications in IP23, IP55, IP56 and IP65 enclosures. We offer a wide range of cooling systems ranging from Self Circulation type (IC611) to independent forced circulation circuits (IC616), water cooled (IC8A1W7) and Tube Ventilated (IC511) to fin cooled (IC411) types.

products.name: Tube Ventilated Induction Motor -IC 5A1A1, IC 5A1A6 (TETV)
products.description: The motors offered ranging from Open Air Circuit (IC01) and Closed Air Circuit (IC611) to independent externally fed air circuit (IC616). These are designed for optimum performance in adherence with application and site requirements of performance and space.

products.name: Tube Ventilated Induction Motor -IC 5A1A1, IC 5A1A6 (TETV)
products.description: These motors have been designed to meet diversified application demands, while maintaining excellent performance and the highest quality. The robust design helps function with variable voltage, variable frequency drives.

products.name: Fan Cooled Induction Motor - IC 4A1A1, IC 4A1A6 (TEFC)
products.description:
CG offers CACW Motors which include UW and FR Series High Voltage Induction Motors.

The UW range of induction motors includes both the Squirrel Cage (i.e. UWC) and the Slip Ring (i.e. UWR) type motors. These motors have totally enclosed construction. The UWC range consist of foot mounted (IMB3) machines which conforms to IS: 2253 / IEC: 60034-7. These motors are totally enclosed with IP55 protection as per IS: 4691 / IEC: 60034-5 and self cooled with air to water IC: 8AIW7- IEC: 60034-6 heat exchangers. The VUWC range is a variant of the UWC range with IMV1 flange mounted construction complying with IEC 60034-5.

products.name: Fan Cooled Induction Motor - IC 4A1A1, IC 4A1A6 (TEFC)
products.description: The UWR range of induction motors is the Slip Ring motor design. The UW range of motors has been designed to meet diversified application demands, while maintaining excellent performance and highest quality.

products.name: Energy Efficient Motors HV - N Series
products.description: The FR range of induction motor includes the FRC/FRCV type Squirrel Cage motor and the FRA/FRAV type Slip Ring motors. The FRC/FRA type is horizontal and foot mounted (IM B3, IEC60034-7) machines, whereas FRCV/FRAV type is vertical and flange mounted (IM V1, IEC 60034-7).These motors are totally enclosed (IP 54, IEC 60034-5), self cooled with air-to-water heat exchanger (IC 81 W7, IEC 34-6).

products.name: Energy Efficient Motors HV - N Series
products.description: Built in accordance with IEC 60034-1 / IS 325 standards, we offer customized, energy efficient and intelligent motors for various applications in IP23, IP55, IP56 and IP65 enclosures. We offer a wide range of cooling systems ranging from Self Circulation type (IC611) to independent forced circulation circuits (IC616), water cooled (IC8A1W7) and Tube Ventilated (IC511) to fin cooled (IC411) types.

products.name: End Use Industry
products.description: The motors offered ranging from Open Air Circuit (IC01) and Closed Air Circuit (IC611) to independent externally fed air circuit (IC616). These are designed for optimum performance in adherence with application and site requirements of performance and space.

products.name: HEAD OFFICE
products.description: These motors have been designed to meet diversified application demands, while maintaining excellent performance and the highest quality. The robust design helps function with variable voltage, variable frequency drives.

products.name: CALL US
products.description:
CG offers SPDP Motors which include UD and FH Series High Voltage Induction Motors.

The Screen Protected Drip Proof (SPDP) are high quality motors in Squirrel Cage and slip ring types. These motors are suitable for all types of industrial drives, mills and pumps. In SPDP motors, the external air is sucked inside through a wire mesh screen by means of a shaft mounted fan. The air suctioned through the louvers traverse along the length of the motor and is expelled at the opposite end through a wire mesh screen.

products.name: EMAIL US
products.description: UD series motors are manufactured in UDR, UDC and VUDC series. All these are continuously rated for S1 duty as per IS: 325 / IEC 60034-7 standards. These motors are suitable for 50 Hz, 3-phase supply. These motors are offered with IP 23 degree of protection. Thus adequate protection is provided against dripping liquids and falling objects as specified in IS: 4691 / IEC 34-5. The mounting dimensions are as per IS: 1231 / IEC-60072 standards.

products.name: QUICK LINKS
products.description: FHC/FHA types are horizontal and foot mounted (IM B3, IEC34-7) machines, whereas FHCV/FHAV types are vertical and flange mounted (IM V1, IEC 34-7). These machines are totally enclosed with IP 23 type of protection complying with IEC 60034-5 standards.

products.name: OUR BUSINESS

products.name: Send Us A Message
products.description: CG manufactures Totally Enclosed Tube Ventilated (TETV) Motors in Squirrel Cage (SCR) and Slip Ring (SR) designs that provide excellent performance in the most demanding environments and load conditions.  The TV Series represents TETV motors that are most suitable for extreme dusty, humid and polluted atmospheres. TV Series Motors are used in industries such as Cement, Steel, Rubber, Paper, Refineries, Petrochemical and Fertilizer units as well as Power Generation plants etc.

products.name: Cast Iron enclosure motors
products.description: Motors play a critical role in functioning of a manufacturing plant. These motors need to be serviced, maintained and analysed to avoid untimely breakdowns. SMARTOR, a motor capable of communicating through CG smart sensor kit, senses and measures self performance on various key parameters like triaxial acceleration, velocity displacement, temperature, noise and operating hours. These meaningful measures can be used to evaluate the performance and condition of the equipment, thereby enabling users to identify inefficiencies and reduce risks related to operation and maintenance. This extends the lifetime of equipment, cuts maintenance costs and reduces or prevents unplanned downtime due to breakdowns.

products.name: Energy Efficient Motors
products.description: Holisticly brand sustainable solutions rather than clicks-and-mortar applications. Phosfluorescently whiteboard fully tested initiatives.

products.name: Energy Efficient Motors
products.description: The increasing costs of energy calls for saving the same in all steps of manufacture. Electric Motor Driven systems used in the industrial processes consume around 70% of the energy used in the industry. Hence innovative technology has to be developed and applied to achieve highest possible efficiency levels. CG has developed Apex Series, energy efficient motors complying with latest IS12615 & IEC60034-30.

products.name: International Efficiency IE2 /IE3-Apex series
products.description:
The majority of electrical energy consumed in most industrial facilities is used to run electric motors. Energy-efficient motors now available are typically from 2 to 6 percent more efficient than their standard counterparts. This efficiency Improvement translates into substantial energy and money savings.

CG offers an entire range of energy efficient motors as per the latest IEC, IS & NEMA standards and also complies with the  efficiency norms of each geographies.

products.name: International Efficiency IE2 /IE3-Apex series
products.description: Out of our commitment towards high energy efficiency and top notch performance, CG presents the next and latest generation of a green solution, Apex series IE4 motor-Super premium efficiency motors.

products.name: Super Premium IE4 Efficiency –Apex Series
products.description: It complies with new efficiency requirements of latest IS12615 &IEC 60034-30-1with highest efficiency and lowest payback period. Our super premium efficiency motor delivers highest efficiency ever which ensures even lower payback period over the life cycle of motor. By maximizing the output especially in continuous duty applications, due to energy efficiency, our Apex series IE4 motor offers a way to curb energy consumption without limiting your growth and hence reduces CO2 emissions.

products.name: Super Premium IE4 Efficiency –Apex Series
products.description: Why should you consider buying Apex series IE4 motors?

products.name: Totally Enclosed Fan Cooled Induction Motor - NG Series
products.description:
The majority of electrical energy consumed in most industrial facilities is used to run electric motors. products.name: Totally Enclosed Fan Cooled Induction Motor - NG Series
products.description: CG manufactures NG-Series Motors, which are the state - of - the art, energy efficient and Totally Enclosed Fan Cooled (TEFC) Squirrel Cage motors. These motors are extremely efficient, even at partial loads and they have very low noise levels. Efficiency of these motors is maximized by effective utilization of materials and optimal design of the fins. There is no sharp drop in the efficiency curve at partial loads due to the reduced friction, windage and core losses.

products.name: DC Motors
products.description: Holisticly brand sustainable solutions rather than clicks-and-mortar applications. Phosfluorescently whiteboard fully tested initiatives.

products.name: DC Motors
products.description:
CG is fully equipped to manufacture state-of-the-art LAMINATED YOKE DC Motors up to 2000 kW (50000 Nm torque) in frame size up to 710 in order to cover all the variable speed drive applications.

The D.C. motor designs are with the latest technology developed and optimized with FEM/ Flux plotting techniques to give maximum torque for each kg of material used. In-house critical facilities like shaft grinding on CNC, Commutator etc. are monitored and tested rigorously to ensure that each motor satisfies a rigid set of performance parameters.

The high quality standards maintained in manufacturing and testing gives superior electrical and mechanical performance-making the motors most suitable for operating in tropical environment. Mandideep (Bhopal) plant is accredited with ISO 9001, ISO 14001 & OHSAS 18001.

We are committed to deliver quality product by stringent quality checks in all stages from pre sales to delivery. Our motors are exported to all major countries.

products.name: We offer entire range of World Class DC Motors in IEC frame up to 710, for various application for constant and variable speed requirements.
products.description:
CG is an established name synonymous with rotating machines. Today, we are in a position to offer an ENTIRE RANGE of world Class DC Motors. We offer laminated Yoke DC Motors in IEC frame up to 710, for various applications for constant and variable speed requirements.

Applications:
Plastic extruders, Printing machines, Steel Rolling Mills, Wire Rod Mills, Apron Feeder, etc.

Industries:
Steel, Sugar, Textile, Rubber, Cement, etc.

products.description: Holisticly brand sustainable solutions rather than clicks-and-mortar applications. Phosfluorescently whiteboard fully tested initiatives.

products.name: Motors for Hazardous Areas (HV)
products.description: One of the special areas of focus for CG has been motors for hazardous area applications. The scenario of operation of these motors and the regulatory requirements are both complex. They are also constantly changing with the introduction of new European and Indian standards. We keep abreast with the latest developments to ensure that all the products fully comply with relevant regulations.

products.name: Motors for Hazardous Areas (HV)
products.description:
Flameproof Induction Motors
(Ex 'd' for ZONE-I, II - Gas Group IIA, IIB)

products.name: Flame Proof Large Motors Ex 'd' (HV)
products.description: The essential principle of electrical apparatus with flame proof enclosure is that the hazardous atmosphere is not excluded from entry into the enclosure. It is recognized that an explosion is likely to occur within the apparatus but the construction of the enclosure should be such that it shall withstand the internal explosion without any evidence of distress and shall prevent the communication of the internal ignition to the surrounding atmosphere (the term flame proof as used here is synonymous with the term "explosion proof" as used in the USA or "Explosion Proof  type 'd' protection" used in Germany and other continental countries)

products.name: Flame Proof Large Motors Ex 'd' (HV)
products.description:
Construction

Stator frame has a barrel type construction made from thick fabricated steel to withstand internal pressure. Stringent checks like pressure tests are in place to ensure to high degree of welding quality. Adequate care is taken during machining to ensure a perfect concentricity of stator bore leading to minimum vibration level and optimum heat transfer. For higher frame sizes i.e. 630 & 710 the frame is of TETV construction. The tubes are double expanded in thick end plates to provide protection against leakage in case of explosion.

products.name: Increased Safety Motors Ex 'e' (HV)
products.description: CG offers high voltage motors suitable for hazardous area of various types (Ex ‘d’ , Ex ‘e’,  Ex ‘n’ , Ex ‘p’) for different zones, temperature classes and various gas groups.

products.name: Increased Safety Motors Ex 'e' (HV)
products.description: CG is fully geared to manufacture and supply a complete range of hazardous low voltage motors designed to suit the ignitable atmospheres present in hazardous Locations such as Zone1, Zone 2 or Class1 Div 1 and 2. The motors are tested in nationally and internationally affiliated Laboratories and are approved by BASEEFA for ATEX, CSA for IEC and Ex Div 2 and DGMS / PESO for complete range of low voltage hazardous motors.

products.name: Non Sparking Motor Ex 'n' (HV)
products.description: We are the first manufacturers in India to develop motors complying with the requirements suitable for Group IIC (For Hydrogen Gas). With the advantage of meeting all the technical standards applicable for Oil and Gas industry, we cater efficiently to all the Oil companies  for their Off-Shore Platforms and Refineries projects.

products.name: Non Sparking Motor Ex 'n' (HV)
products.description: CG manufactures state-of-the-art INCREASED SAFETY MOTORS. These motors meet the stringent quality and performance norms laid down by both Indian and International statutory bodies. We supply these motors for use in hazardous areas that are normally encountered in chemical industries, petrochemical refineries and mines etc for Zone II areas.

products.name: Pressurized Motor Ex ‘p’ (HV)
products.description: We also have a range of NON SPARKING MOTORS that are highly versatile and are offered in enclosure types such as CACA, CACW, TETV and TEFC.

products.name: Our Parent Companies
products.description: Ex ‘p’ motor is an economical solution for Large rating Flameproof motors (FLP motors) which can be used in Zone-1 of Hazardous Area. With this sucessful development, CG can offer motor upto 12 MW with Ex ‘p’ enclosure; both for zone 1 and zone 2. Pneumetic Pressurisation System with Automatic Purge Arrangement is provided in such motors.

products.name: Advanced Product Search
products.description: CG is constantly striving to make the country self-reliant and in this regard it has indegeniously designed & developed its one of the largest Ex ‘p’ motor of rating 2950kW, 2Pole, 11kV with purging arrangement for Hindustan Urvarak Rasayan Limited (HURL).  Motors supplied through Ebara Machinary, Japan and will be installed at Ammonia Urea Fertilizer Plant for Pump Application .

products.name: Send Us A Message
products.description: Motor is equipped with fully Pneumetic Pressurisation System with Automatic Purge Arrangement. Motor has underwent statuatory testing of Type ‘p’  and consequently certified by Karandikar Laboratories Private Ltd. (KLPL), Mumbai.

products.name: Special Application Motors
products.description: Holisticly brand sustainable solutions rather than clicks-and-mortar applications. Phosfluorescently whiteboard fully tested initiatives.

products.name: Special Application Motors
products.description:
For the raw and cement ball-mill twin drives Slip Ring or other wound type rotor motors are used all over the world. CG Hungary is the first in the world to successfully break this tradition with double Squirrel Cage motors supplied to Duna-Dráva Cement Company at Beremend.

This new solution is significantly cheaper from the investment view compared to the traditional solutions.

On one hand the double-cage motor is substantially cheaper than the Slip Ring motor, On the other hand the costly starting equipment and the adherent shortcircuiting switch together with the controller are not required. The usage of our solution due to the low operational and maintenance costs further increase the adaptability of this new equipment.

products.name: Special Application motors consists of GD Series Brake Motor, Oil Well Pump Motor, Re-rolling Mill motor & Double Cage motor for Twin Drive application  designed to meet all requirements of any specific application.
products.description: We manufacture motors for special applications. Some of them include Double Cage Motor for Cement Mill, GD Series Brake Motor, Oil Well Pump Motor and Re-rolling Mill motor.

products.name: Double Cage Motor for Cement Mill
products.description: CG offers Kibosh Brake Motors, the most reliable range with highly competitive delivery time. Kibosh Brake Motors is designed to serve various braking applications like crane, hoists, rolling mills, wind mills, elevators etc.

products.name: Double Cage Motor for Cement Mill
products.description: Every CG make safe area motor, up to 132 frames, is having the unique feature being able to be modified to a brake motor by using brake kit in approximately 30 Minutes.

products.name: Brake Motors
products.description: We manufacture motors for special applications. Some of them include Double Cage Motor for Cement Mill, GD Series Brake Motor, Oil Well Pump Motor and Re-rolling Mill motor.

products.name: Brake Motors
products.description: CG has now launched their latest designs for OIL WELL PUMP MOTORS, with new and vital electrical performance characteristics and features.These motors are designed with high slip and high torque (NEMA D Design) as per requirements of the oil well beam pumping unit. Coupled with low initial costs and minimal maintenance, CG Oil Well Pump Motors have become an obvious choice of every industry.

products.name: Oil Well Pump Motor
products.description: We manufacture motors for special applications. Some of them include Double Cage Motor for Cement Mill, GD Series Brake Motor, Oil Well Pump Motor and Re-rolling Mill motor.

products.name: Oil Well Pump Motor
products.description: With versatile experience over the years, CG has developed a highly standardized range of motors dedicated specifically to the Re-rolling mill industry. Re-rolling mill duty motors are used to drive the re-rolling mill where hot steel billets are rolled in to RODS, FLAT BARS, RAILS, CHANNELS, ANGLES and SHEETS etc. The working of these mills is under demanding conditions of widely fluctuating loads and sudden overloads lasting for few seconds. We are manufacturing Re-rolling mill duty induction motors that are compact and robust. The simple construction of these motors requires minimal attention and provides greater reliability.

products.name: Re-Rolling Mill Motor
products.description: We manufacture motors for special applications. Some of them include Double Cage Motor for Cement Mill, GD Series Brake Motor, Oil Well Pump Motor and Re-rolling Mill motor.

products.description: We manufacture motors for special applications. Some of them include Double Cage Motor for Cement Mill, GD Series Brake Motor, Oil Well Pump Motor and Re-rolling Mill motor.
